title: 5.14 Mac Bug: Game freezes/crashes every 5-10 minutes.
body:
Client repair function doesn't help. Nor does logging in/out.

Game is entirely unplayable. 

Bug exists on other servers, check LOL subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3e63b9/514_patch_bugs_megathread/

- **Server:** OCE 

- **Type of Bug:** Mac In-Game bug

- **Description:**  Freezes and crashes every 5-10 mins

- **Video / Screenshot:** 

- **Steps to reproduce:** Start a game on my Macbook Pro (happened to be co-op vs. ai Intermediate)

- **Expected result:** Fully-functional gameplay

- **Observed result:** Crashing every 5-10 mins

- **Reproduction rate:** 100% - Even after full repair.

- **System specs:** Macbook Pro. 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo 4 GB 1067 MHz DDR3 Macintosh HD NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256 MB

replies.body: New patch is crashing mac client every 5-10 minutes for me as well

Hey guys, you're right this issue isn't isolated to any one server. We're currently collecting information regarding two Mac bugs a thread in the Report a Bug Board. We're investigating the crashing issue and a texture bug with the shop (it may display with a red block in the background), can you provide the following to my colleagues in that thread:

* OSX Version - 
* CPU - 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
* GPU - NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256 MB
* Are you experiencing shop texture issues, crashes, or both? 

Thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/ar3AhWfH-patch-514-constan-crashing-mac

> [{quoted}](name=Son Golin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=W0nuMXl4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-23T17:39:17.782+0000)
>
> Hey guys, you're right this issue isn't isolated to any one server. We're currently collecting information regarding two Mac bugs a thread in the Report a Bug Board. We're investigating the crashing issue and a texture bug with the shop (it may display with a red block in the background), can you provide the following to my colleagues in that thread:
> 
> * OSX Version - 
> * CPU - 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
> * GPU - NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256 MB
> * Are you experiencing shop texture issues, crashes, or both? 
> 
> Thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/ar3AhWfH-patch-514-constan-crashing-mac

I've noticed everyone seems to be experiencing the same issues with the red shop issue etc, which at one point I had these exact same issues, but I just wanted to let you know that after experiencing those issues for two games of ARAM my game now crashes during the loading screen of any gamemode, ARAM, Custom games, normals, ranked you name it. I just dont understand how this can have happened, especially in ranked as it has the legacy HUD as of now.
Ranked is fine. its  the heads up display thats probably crashing everything and the shop is helping. i can play ranked games no problem

> [{quoted}](name=Slyfoxkan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=W0nuMXl4,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-07-23T20:54:38.634+0000)
>
> Ranked is fine. its  the heads up display thats probably crashing everything and the shop is helping. i can play ranked games no problem

There must be some other issues with my client then, I have repaired it through the launch screen but it didn't help.
Glad to see you guys are working on it. Hope the game will be fixed soon, I'd hate to miss more of Bilgewater... Good luck on finding and fixing the bugs !
when do u think it will be fixed????

i have some friends are having the crashing issue on windows,although i use mac there is the red shop bug and crashing issues aswell,NO DISRESPECT BUT PATCH 5.14 IS BROKEN,i seriously have no idea how u guys mist all that on mac and on windows .......just saying                      And hope u guys can fix this issue on all apple computers :D thx for taking this into consideration

i have some friends are having the crashing issue on windows,although i use mac there is the red shop bug and crashing issues aswell,NO DISRESPECT BUT PATCH 5.14 IS BROKEN,i seriously have no idea how u guys mist all that on mac and on windows .......just saying

I am experiencing both issues as well, it is unfortunate and I hope to see a speedy fix . Thanks RIOT! 
  OS X YOSEMITE version 10.10.4
 MacBook Pro (13inch, Mid 2010)
Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
Memory: 4GB 1067 MHz DDR3
Graphics : NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256MB

Yeah I am having the same troubles too. I got an iMac that isn't that old, and it crashes every 5-10 minutes. Its getting to be really annoying cause I can't play my favorite game anymore without the constant crashing. Please fix this soon

I'm running:

osx yosemite version 10.103
MacBook Pro (13-inch, 2010)
2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
4GB 1067 MHz DDR3
NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256 MB

And the same thing is happening to me too, crashes every 5-7 mins, before this new patch I would experience momentary freezes when i was about to die but it was still very playable but now it freezes and crashes the game, it even happened a few times I was just leaving base after loading back into the game please fix this!!!

This laptop is what i use when away from home, and not with my main windows desktop.

This is also happening to me on NA and I have a 2009 Mac. It is perfectly up to date (10.10.4). A lot of people have been having problems and it is not just mac, but this specific bug is happening to mac players. It might be the new 5.14 patch because this has never happened to me before. Hope Riot fixes it.

Having the same issue here. Mid 2010 MacBook Pro. 2.53 GHz Intel core i5. 4 GB Memory. Running 10.9.5.

Game splats every 5-10 min and I have a red background when I open shop.

Experiencing both issues. There's clearly enough people having it that it's being looked at but my god, it's like this every fucking patch. Trying to play League for up to a week after a new patch launches is just a nightmare, there's always something lurking, ready to bugsplat you for no damn reason.
